p: this is! However I do so love you all four. Write please to your Mom.
Thanks so much for remembering my Birthday.

I was proud of the lovely letter and Trimmings from Joanie - So many thanks to her and to you Maxie for the help you gave to make the letter a success. I have felt you be rind the letters Joanie has been writing and you are dear to do the part a Mama alone can do in such things.
Sigurd boy what do you mean by saying you have not been hearing it seems to me my letters are notes have been rather frequent. Anyway there is nothing wrong. Daddy is going to have a good talk with

is Esquire management soon, and then we will Know what he will do next whether he will remain with a more satisfactory arrangement - or else he will accept a 3 month's lectureship at Kansas City U. which has just been offered him from September to December.
I am very well and Amama fairly so.
The weather has very bad here in most places.

Hilda has improved marvelously in her singing - And how you would agree with me! Her voice is a lot better, she is absolutely on pitch and the phrases better - and she looks so sweet . She is truly lovely .
